column1: Smoque BBQ////BBQ here is delicioius! All of the meat
column3: is tender and succulent. Though the sauce is sweet with some tang
column4: eating the wonderful meat alone is enough for maximum pleasure. I would recommend getting the 1/2 and 1/2 sandwich deal with a side of ribs... if you want to take a trip to meat heaven. Sides are also tasty but are a bit smaller. That's not a problem because you don't take a trip to a BBQ place for the sides. The place itself is also kind of small
column6: and there's an outdoor seating area when it's nice outside. There is no wait staff at this place. In my mind I thought it was a sit down and order kind of place but that didn't take away from my experience. The food is so good that I will gladly come back here again.
